content.body: I was referring to calls like `TypedArrayCreateSameType(O, << F(len) >>)`: Is it not acceptable for the spec to "read through" itself and know that these calls cannot trigger UC, although some other `TypedArrayCreateSameType` calls might?
content.formatted_body: I was referring to calls like TypedArrayCreateSameType(O, << F(len) >>): Is it not acceptable for the spec to "read through" itself and know that these calls cannot trigger UC, although some other TypedArrayCreateSameType calls might?

content.body: ah, yeah, it's fine to mark the callsites of TypedArrayCreateSameType
but I think the better fix is to change TypedArrayCreateSameType to take a length instead of a list of ES values
